  • Mmodifiers/snapEdges
  • Globals
  • Minteract
  • FpreventDefault

    • modifiers/snapEdges

    This module allows snapping of the edges of targets during resize interactions.

    Source:
    • packages/modifiers/snap/edges.ts, line 1 
    interact(target).resizable({
  snapEdges: {
    targets: [interact.snappers.grid({ x: 100, y: 50 })],
  },
})

interact(target).resizable({
  snapEdges: {
    targets: [
      interact.snappers.grid({
       top: 50,
       left: 50,
       bottom: 100,
       right: 100,
      }),
    ],
  },
})
